name: Chen

active_effects.name: Shadow Mastery
active_effects.description: Mastery of shadow manipulation increases control and range.

appearance_summary: Chen is a slender Nara with sharp, intelligent eyes and dark hair that often falls into his face. He moves with deliberate precision and carries himself with quiet confidence. His shadow seems to move independently at times, and he's often seen studying maps or intelligence reports.
backstory_summary: Born into the Nara clan, Chen displayed exceptional intelligence and natural talent for shadow manipulation from childhood. He excelled in strategic thinking and became a key member of Konoha's Intelligence Division. His ability to control shadows and analyze situations has made him invaluable for both combat and intelligence operations.
personality_summary: Chen is a brilliant strategist who prefers to think several steps ahead. He's patient and methodical, using his intelligence and shadow abilities to control the battlefield. While not physically imposing, his tactical mind and shadow manipulation make him a formidable opponent and valuable ally.
combat_directives: Use shadow manipulation to control and restrain opponents. Prioritize strategic positioning and battlefield control. Support allies with shadow-based techniques. Use intelligence to predict enemy movements. Maintain tactical advantage through careful planning and shadow manipulation.
